channel.title: I need help mostly related to commands
channel.description:
[size=18pt]OKAY! SO I WANT TO KNOW HOW MY SERVER CAN LIKE SEND A MESSAGE EVERY 3 MINUTES TO EVERY ONE(NOT A PRIVATE MESSAGE) AND I WANT TO KNOW HOW I CAN ADD IPANEL TO MY SERVER DOING THAT WOULD MAKE ALOT OF THINGS EASIER FOR ME![/size] AND I NEED A YELL COMMANDS WHERE WHEN USED IT WOULD SHOW THEIR RIGHTS (LIKE MOD,OWNER,ADMIN ETC.)
I WOULD GREATLY APPRECIATE THAT!
ALSO CAN YOU MAKE A TUT ON HOW TO ADD NEW ITEMS TO YOUR SERVER?
